properties.entry:
SELECT bsl.id, bsl.status, enginetype_id enginetypeId
FROM strategy_server bsl WHERE bsl.ip=? and enginetype_id=? and server_type=?

SELECT sb.st_uuid strategyUUid, qs.FilePath filePath, sb.name strategyName, sb.status state, sb.upload_time uploadTime, lookback_stime backTestStartTime, lookback_etime backTestEndTime
FROM strategy_baseinfo sb LEFT JOIN qstrategy qs ON sb.st_uuid=qs.StrategyID WHERE sb.back_test_sid=? and sb.enginetype_id=? and sb.status BETWEEN ? and ? and filePath<>''

SELECT sb.st_uuid strategyUUid, qs.FilePath filePath, sb.name strategyName, sb.status state, sb.upload_time uploadTime, lookback_stime backTestStartTime, lookback_etime backTestEndTime
FROM strategy_baseinfo sb LEFT JOIN qstrategy qs ON sb.st_uuid=qs.StrategyID WHERE sb.run_server_id=? and sb.enginetype_id=? and sb.status=? and filePath<>''

SELECT sb.st_uuid strategyUUid FROM strategy_baseinfo sb
WHERE sb.back_test_sid=? and sb.st_uuid=? and sb.status=2
UPDATE strategy_baseinfo SET status=? WHERE st_uuid=?
UPDATE strategy_baseinfo SET status=? WHERE back_test_sid=? AND status=?
INSERT INTO strategy_server( enginetype_id, server_type, name, ip, status )VALUES( ?,?,?,?,? )
UPDATE strategy_baseinfo SET back_test_sid=?, status=? WHERE st_uuid=?
UPDATE strategy_baseinfo SET pass_time=NOW() WHERE id=? and pass_time=''
UPDATE strategy_baseinfo SET back_test_sid=?, status=?, pass_time=NOW() WHERE id=?
UPDATE strategy_server SET status=? WHERE id=?

SELECT id, ip, status, server_type type, enginetype_id enginetypeId, name name
FROM strategy_server bsl
